fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player. Learn who they targeted on every night before this one, who they will target tonight, and who they target tomorrow night.
- After participating in a hacked node, during the day, select a player and read a book on their history, learning what roles they rerolled out of, or the lack of any if applicable.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your first ability does not tell you who your target is targeting tonight.
- Your second ability will be in order, but not specify if it was a global or same-slot reroll. You also only learn roles they rerolled, not the one they kept.
